meanings.definition: No commonly-used, simple dictionary definitions found for the word 'extincts'.
meanings.sent1: The volcano erupts and extincts all life in its path.
meanings.sent2: The dinosaur species extincts millions of years ago.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally extincts the recipe by adding too much salt.
meanings.sent4: The passage of time slowly extincts the memories of childhood.
meanings.sent5: The wildfire quickly extincts the forest, leaving only ashes behind.
